thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Tecnotree Preliminary 2017 Revenue At About EUR 55 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tecnotree Preliminary 2017 Revenue At About EUR 55 Million
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - TECNOTREE OYJ:
* TECNOTREE RECOGNISES MEUR 16.7 IMPAIRMENT, GIVES PRELIMINARY INFORMATION ON RESULT AND PUBLISHES FINANCIAL STATEMENT RELEASE EARLIER THAN ANNOUNCED
* ‍DECIDED TO WRITE-DOWN GOODWILL OF APPROXIMATELY EUR 16.7 MILLION IN ITS CONSOLIDATED BALANCE SHEET​
* ‍ESTIMATES THAT GROUP‘S REVENUE FOR 2017 WILL BE APPROXIMATELY EUR 55 MILLION.​
* ‍OPERATING RESULT WITHOUT WRITE-DOWN DESCRIBED ABOVE IS ESTIMATED TO AMOUNT TO EUR 7.5 - 8.5 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
